Class AchievementBack

  • java.lang.Object
    • greenfoot.Actor
      • AchievementBack

  • public class AchievementBack
extends greenfoot.Actor
    AchievementBack is a class that aids the hitbox of the Achievement Class by creating a transparent image that can easily detect if the mouse is hovering over it. It creates a transparent image the same size as the Achievement Image
    Version:
    January 16th 2019
    Author:
    Jonathan

      Constructor and Description
      AchievementBack(int a, int b)
      Creates A new AchievementBack with a image size of the Achievement Image
